rules.description: Shift + F18(original CapsLock) to CapsLock
Quit application by holding ⌘Q or ⌘⌥Q
Shift to toggle input source (en/zh-Hans)
Fn + Control + W/S/A/D/Q/E/Z/X to move window
Fn + Control + arrow to zoom window to half screen
Fn + Control + [ ] ; ' to zoom window to corner
Fn + Option (+ Shift) + arrow to expand / shrink window border
Fn + Control + Option + arrow to zoom window to 2/3 screen
Fn + Control + C to center window
Fn + S to center window
Fn + Shift + Control + C to center and zoom window
Fn + Control + F to make window fill screen
Fn + F to toggle Full-Screen
Fn + Tab/` to Foward/Back
Fn + 1 to Enter
Fn + f1-f12 to f1-f12 to fix conflicts between Touch Bar & Karabiner
Right Option + F10/F11/F12 to volume mute/down/up
Swap command and control for VNC Viewer (need to remove default remapping in VNC Viewer)
Touch top-left corner + W/A/S/D/Z/X/Q/E to navigate
Double-tap option to toggle Touch Bar mode
